text.section: In this part the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Eligible person" means an individual with a developmental disability that is likely to continue indefinitely or an individual with a severe chronic disability that is attributable to a physical or mental impairment, other than the sole diagnosis of mental illness, or to a combination of mental and physical impairments that is likely to continue indefinitely.

section.section: "Individual support services" means a program designed to assist eligible persons in developing their maximum potential and in maintaining themselves in the community.

text.section: "Program" means the Individual Support Services Program.
